content: The section of the "Summa Theologica" that deals with language and the relationship between words and their referents is in Part I, Question 13, Articles 1-11. In this section, Aquinas discusses the nature of signification and how words function as signs that represent concepts or things in the world. He also explores the different types of words, including concrete and abstract terms, and the various ways in which words can be used figuratively.
